alert.note: Alert for Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 9:01PM MDT until April 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lyon, Minnehaha and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Brookings and Hamlin Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Cottonwood and Murray Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... Big Sioux River near Canton affecting Lyon, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY, APRIL 21... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Forestburg. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Friday, April 21. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, many of the county and township roads along the river are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 13.2 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun James River Forestburg 12.0 10.9 Thu 9 pm 12.2 12.9 13.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.
